examples.comment_3: Remove selected watermarks from the document

content.title: **[{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** simplifies the task of removing watermarks from business documents. Empower your {{EnvName}} application by integrating our library and follow these simple steps:
content.step_1: Begin by instantiating the main class, {{TextWatermarkerBold}}, with the {{FileformatCap}} document. Our API supports processing documents provided as either a stream or a local path.
content.step_2: Utilize {{TextSearchCriteriaBold}} to narrow down the set of watermarks to be processed. You can use various parameters such as images, text, or formatting features. The more specific the search parameters you provide, the more precise the results you obtain.
content.step_3: Process the list of document watermarks obtained as a search result and remove them from the document.
content.step_4: After removing the watermarks, save the resulting document as a local file or a byte stream.

more_features.title: Streamline Watermark Removal with {{ProgLang}} {{EnvName}} API
more_features.description: Discover the powerful watermark removal capabilities of our {{ProgLang}} {{EnvName}} API, designed to seamlessly integrate with your {{EnvName}} applications. Remove or clear watermarks from PDFs and office documents efficiently while preserving the original file quality.

feature_1.title: Precise Watermark Clearance
feature_1.content: Our {{EnvName}} API provides precise tools to cleanly remove watermarks from any document. Tailored for developers, this feature ensures that removing watermarks does not compromise document quality or layout.

feature_2.title: Automate Bulk Watermark Removal
feature_2.content: Automate the process of removing watermarks from large document sets with our {{EnvName}} API. Ideal for businesses that handle large volumes of documents, improving both efficiency and document security.

feature_3.title: Advanced Watermark Editing Features
feature_3.content: Leverage advanced features to selectively edit out or modify watermarks. Our API supports detailed adjustments to ensure your documents maintain a professional appearance while securing sensitive information.
